Tokyo on sale with Air New Zealand - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Tokyo on sale with Air New Zealand Tokyo is a city of contrasts, blending ancient traditions with cutting-edge modernity. Explore serene temples, vibrant neighbourhoods, and world-class shopping districts. Savor exceptional cuisine, from street food to Michelin-star dining. Experience the bustle of Shibuya Crossing, the elegance of Ginza, and the tranquillity of Ueno Park. With its unique culture, technology, and endless energy, Tokyo offers an unforgettable journey that captivates every traveller. Deal Details Travel Dates 21 Apr 2026 - 26 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Nov 16, 2025 Priced From $2,575 Enquire Now Tokyo is a city of contrasts, blending ancient traditions with cutting-edge modernity. Explore serene temples, vibrant neighbourhoods, and world-class shopping districts. Savor exceptional cuisine, from street food to Michelin-star dining. Experience the bustle of Shibuya Crossing, the elegance of Ginza, and the tranquillity of Ueno Park. With its unique culture, technology, and endless energy, Tokyo offers an unforgettable journey that captivates every traveller. Accommodation Tokyo Dome Hotel (4 stars) The Tokyo Dome Hotel, located near Tokyo Dome City, offers luxurious accommodations with stunning city views. Known for its modern design, the hotel features spacious rooms, top-tier dining, a fitness centre, and a swimming pool. It provides convenient access to shopping, entertainment, and sports venues, making it a popular choice for all travellers. Rooms Standard Room (4 nights) 21 Apr - 26 Jun 26 Stay price: $2,575.00 Includes: Breakfast daily Note: Blackout dates apply. 08-26 May 26. Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Tokyo (Narita) from Auckland 4 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, twin or double share Sheraton Miyako Hotel Tokyo (5 stars) Sheraton Miyako Hotel Tokyo blends modern sophistication with traditional Japanese charm, offering a serene retreat in the bustling city. Located in the tranquil Shirokanedai area, it provides easy access to major attractions and transportation. The hotel features elegant rooms with contemporary comforts, lush Japanese gardens, a relaxing indoor pool, and a fully equipped fitness centre. Savour diverse culinary experiences at its restaurants, from authentic Japanese to international cuisine. Experience the exceptional hospitality and peaceful ambiance with a stay at Sheraton Miyako Hotel. Rooms Premium Superior Room (4 nights) 25 Apr - 26 Jun 26 Stay price: $2,835.00 Note: Blackout dates apply. 08-26 May 26. Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Tokyo (Narita) from Auckland 4 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, twin or double share Kimpton Shinjuku Tokyo (4 stars) Kimpton Shinjuku Tokyo is a stylish, boutique hotel located in the heart of Tokyo's vibrant Shinjuku district. Blending modern design with Japanese influences, it offers luxurious rooms and exceptional amenities, including a rooftop bar, an elegant restaurant, and a wellness center. Guests can enjoy personalised service, with a focus on comfort and convenience, whether for business or leisure. The hotel's prime location provides easy access to shopping, dining, and cultural attractions. Rooms Essential Room (4 nights) 21 Apr - 26 Jun 26 Stay price: $3,275.00 Note: Blackout dates apply. 08-26 May 26. Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Tokyo (Narita) from Auckland 4 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, twin or double share Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 31 October 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 03 November 2025 until 16 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Fare Basis: For travel: 21 Apr 26 - 26 Jun 26 - KSLA70 ('K' Class). General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares are based on 'The Works' economy class. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply. Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs. Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
